description: Bier Central is the place to be for real beer lovers. In this typical Belgian beer bar you can taste as many as 24 beers on draft and 300 bottled beers, all from Belgian soil.

Little cafes in Antwerp can say they have more than 300 different beers
in house to which 12 of the vessel.
A stone's throw from the Grand Place is a mecca for like-minded people looking for an original beer. The beers are invariably drawn according to the rules of art and bottles served at the tables as it should!
Right next to City Hall is the brown bar of Antwerp. This is not just a café but an institution. After the municipal council will regularly exchange their stories here.

Thanks to its unique location, you have a splendid view at the majestic Antwerp City Hall, the Market Square and the Brabo Fountain. From the renovated terrace (50 seats) you are privileged to witness many of Antwerp's activities such as the Guild celebrations, the Rubensmarkt, the Natour-Derny Spectacle, the arrival of the IronMan, the Tattoo, the Hand Throwing Festival, the ice rink during the Christmas and New Year period the Christmas market, etc ...

Zeppos stands for no nonsense meals at moderate prices - you can drop by for a quick bite, a cozy dinner with friends, cake and coffee or simply a drink. This Antwerp hotspot is located on Mechelseplein and is a favorite of many, hence it is also regularly buzzing. During the summer months you can nest on the large terrace and the pie some rays while enjoying your food.
"De Muze" Jazz Café hosts a daily surprise of bands to jam sessions, everyone is welcome. Entrance free.

Korsakov is known as one of the nicest bars in town.
This pub has two floors and a smoking room. The interior consists of two-hand materials and original pieces. Furthermore, the spiral staircase makes the interior completely.
In café Korsakov, you can not just drink, you can also enjoy delicious soups, croques and even sandwiches.
A nice place to meet nice people or to go and watch a concert!

This cafe is a paradise for beer lovers. Kulminator offers its customers a beer with more than 600 different beers from around the world!
Kulminator owes its name to one of the most impressive beers in the world which was brewed in Kulmbach, Germany.
Café Kulminator was named "Best pub in the world" by the renowned beer ratebeer.com site.

Chatleroi is a "chat" cafe in the South of Antwerp.
Chatleroi offers a wide selection of Trappist. Enjoy Orval or Chimay with pop and rock music in the background.
Every 1st and 3rd Sunday of the month live concerts.

"De Vismijn" is an authentic pub where everyone feels at home.
In this café you will also find a champion Belgian beer taps, which taps the best Stella on draft.
